definition: a sailing ship with 3 (or more) masts, to tan a skin with bark tannins
details:
noun
- a sailing ship with 3 (or more) masts
= synonyms: barque
- the sound made by a dog
- a noise resembling the bark of a dog
- tough protective covering of the woody stems and roots of trees and other woody plants
verb
- to tan a skin with bark tannins
= example: to tan a skin with bark tannins
- to speak in an unfriendly tone
= example: to speak in an unfriendly tone
- to make barking sounds
= example: to make barking sounds
- to remove the bark of a tree
= example: to remove the bark of a tree
= synonyms: skin
